Uses of Interface
se.swedenconnect.opensaml.sweid.saml2.signservice.dss.Message

Packages that use Message
Package
Description
se.swedenconnect.opensaml.sweid.saml2.signservice
SAML support for Signature Services according to the Swedish eID Framework.
se.swedenconnect.opensaml.sweid.saml2.signservice.dss
Offers support for the XML types defined in "DSS Extension for Federated Central Signing Services".
se.swedenconnect.opensaml.sweid.saml2.signservice.dss.impl
Implementation classes for Signature Service DSS.

    SignMessageDecrypter.decrypt(SignMessage signMessage)

    Methods in se.swedenconnect.opensaml.sweid.saml2.signservice with parameters of type Message
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Attribute
    SignMessageDigestIssuer.create(Message message)
    Creates a signMessageDigest attribute using the default digest method.
    Attribute
    SignMessageDigestIssuer.create(Message message, EntityDescriptor recipient)
    Creates a signMessageDigest attribute using the preferred digest method of the recipient, or the default digest method if none is specified in the recipient metadata.
